archimate:Product.name: Textexture
archimate:Product.documentation:
Textexture: an online tool to visualize any text as a network. The resulting graph can be used to get a quick visual summary of the text, read the most relevant excerpts and find similar texts. Textexture is developed by Nodus Labs. at http://textexture.com/
It is outdated and replaced by Infranodus at https://infranodus.com
